name: The Bugaboos
description: 360 pages of sweet alpine granite. Includes routes in the Vowell group and all the main bugs spires: Bugaboo, Snowpatch, Crescent, Pigeon, and the Howsers. It covers approaches, descents, recommended routes, and camping within the park at the Conrad Kain Hut, Applebee Dome, and more remote areas.
